Name: How I Met Your Mother
Description: The story is told by the main character - Ted Mosby to his two children about the love story of their parents. When he was 27, Ted felt like getting married after his roommate Marshall became engaged to his best friend from college, Lily after nine years of dating. With the help of 'sex expert' Barney, Ted has embarked on a search for his 'half'. The movie is extremely funny and a great resource for learning to speak English.

Name: Attack on Titan
Description: The film revolves around a trio of close friends Eren Jaeger, Mikasa Ackerman and Armin Arlert on their journey to fight against cannibal Titans. In a surprise attack by the Great Shaped Giant, the outermost layer of Maria that protected humans from the Titans was destroyed, the Titans massively invaded the Shiganshina district.

Name: Descendants of the Sun 2016
Description: After completing his military service, Song Jong Ki returned to the small screen with the hit Korean romantic drama Descendants of the Sun, which quickly became a phenomenon throughout Asia.

Name: My sassy girl
Description: Sassy Girl - Sassy Girl is in the top of the best Korean movies about love, emotional humor based on a true story that is popular on the internet. When the boy Kyun Woo, innocent and a bit goofy, runs into a drunken sassy girl.

Name: Reply 1988
Description: The movie Reply 1988 directed by Shin Won Ho continues to delight TV viewers after the success of Reply 1997 and Reply 1994. This is not just a love triangle between Sung Duk-sun and two friends. Kim Jung-hwan and Choi Taek in the Sang Mun Dong neighborhood, but also a meaningful family love work about neighborliness and humanity.

Name: Secret Love Affair
Description: Secret Love is one of the top best Korean films about emotional love, making many viewers fall in love at first sight. The story revolves around the risky love between Lee Sun Jae, a young pianist, and Oh Hye Won, who helped him realize his natural musical abilities.
